THE SLOGAN OF ME:s SALES PROGRAM:
TANDBERG RADIO
— a radio built for the requirements of today
and tomorrow, a radio for those who wish the
very best as to sound reproduction and reception.
Everybody admits: it is first-class.
— a name recnogized in its area. Offers always
the latest novelties in microphone engineering.
-SWEDISH_
PHONOTAPE
— a Swedish novelty. Tape recordings of eminent
orchestras and soloists. Classical music, popular
melodies, modern jazz. Playing time: 1—4 hours.
TANDBERG
TAPERECORDER
— the ideal taperecorder which has also become
the most popular and most sold machine of the
market. Long playing time, excellent sound, easy
to manage, elegant shape, low price. Now also
with stereophonic sound — first in Sweden.
JERROLD
— the best antenna amplifier of the market, the
only amplifier for all channels.
MC INTOSH
— is considered the very best Hi-Fi amplifier,
which is constructed up till now.
fmco
— the perfect TV-antenna. Geomatic. Covers all
channels. Highest quality is combined with lowest
price. Is available in 8 different models.
